flawed_nl_solution:
Cheese pizzas are 3/2 of the pizza's purchased because 2 / (2+1) = 3/2
She buys 9 cheese pizzas because 6 x (3/2) = <<6*3/2=9>>9
These give her 162 pieces of cheese pizza because 9 x 18 = <<9*18=162>>162
The students at 154 pieces of cheese because 162 - 8 = <<162-8=154>>154
There are 77 students in her class because 154 / 2 = <<154/2=77>>77
#### 77

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2/3, not 3/2. It appears the numerator and denominator were swapped.
